data.title: News
data.text:
Summer holiday period

The Students Service will be closed for Summer holidays from August 3rd to August 25th. We will not be able to assist you, so we suggest you to send your queries throught TicketingUV not earlier than August 26th, when we reengage our schedule and ordinary operation. Happy Summer!

Masters open in Extraordinary Pre-registration Phase 2024-25

Consult the list of master's degrees you can apply for in the Extraordinary Pre-enrolment Phase for master's degree studies. Remember that the application procedure will be open until 3 September.

[Read more]

Definitive list of the Master’s degrees offered

Publicació de la proposta provisional d'ajudes a l'estudi de la Universitat de València per al curs 2023-2024.

[Read more]

Proposta provisional de concessió i denegació de beques propies de la UVEG

Allocation of places on the Master's Waiting List call for applications

The Universitat de València informs you that the Allocation of places on the Master's Waiting List call for Master's studies 2024-2025 is available at the Website and Virtual Office from 24 July.

[Read more]

Enrolment information

Opening of the Extraordinary Pre-registration Phase for Master's Degrees 2024-25

The Extraordinary Phase of the pre-enrolment procedure for master's degree studies for the academic year 2024-25 will be open from 22 July at 14:00 until 3 September. Important: Consult the provisional list of Master's Degrees offered in the Extraordinary Phase.

[Read more]

Provisional publication of the Master’s degrees offered

Publication of admission lists for master's degree studies. 2024-25

The Universitat de València informs you that the Places Allocation Results for Master's studies 2024-2025 will be available at the Website and Virtual Office from 12 July.

[Read more]

Enrolment information

Call for enrolment grants for students of the Official Master’s Degree in Law and Gender-Based Violence of the Universitat de València, academic year 2023/24

Scholarships are announced for students of the Official Master's Degree in Law and Gender Violence for the 2023-2024 academic year.

[Read more]

Distribution of Becas Colaboración year 24/25

[Read more]

June 14th (14h) is the deadline for pre-enrolment for Master’s Degree Academic year 2024-25

You have until 14 June 2024 (14:00h) to submit your application in the ordinary phase: it is a telematic process that you can carry out from any electronic device and does not involve any payment (*).

[Read more]

Easter holiday period

The Students Service will be closed for Easter holidays from March 28th to April 8th. We will not be able to assist you, so we suggest you to send your queries throught TicketingUV not earlier than April 9th, when we reengage our schedule and ordinary operation. Happy Easter!
